description:

Expected Result: tips shows in given format
Actual Result: tips shows in one line
OB: When a large content is put in a text item and the mouse is placed over the text item, the tips show the content in one line.
EB: The tips should show the content in the given format when the mouse is placed over the text item with large content.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Put a text item on the screen
3. Enter a large content in the text item
4. Save the changes
5. Place the mouse over the text item

Expected: The tips should show the content in the given format
Actual: The tips show the content in one line
